Tok Stori

Familie
Spiritualität
Kultur
Essen
About
EN / DE
Announcement
A dialogue space for German users to share their collective understanding of German identity
Family
What are important moments for your family to gather?
Spirituality
What are your thoughts about German missionaries travelling to the Pacific to share their ideas of spirituality?
Culture
Is Oktoberfest a cultural event for German’s or tourists?
Food
Is there a specific type of utensil you would only find in a German kitchen?
Show more questions

About

This prototype is a collaboration from a digital residency to create a dialogue space for Tok Stori (sharing stories) that allows German users to share their collective understanding of German identity and enables Pacific people to choose what they want to know about Germany. Download and print this as a zine!

Tok Stori by Lisa Hilli is licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0

Code by shi Blank
